alert.note: Alert for Crawford (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 2:25PM EDT until August 12 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL CRAWFORD COUNTY... At 225 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Harmonsburg, or near Meadville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Meadville, Titusville, Cambridge Springs, Riceville, Harmonsburg, Lincolnville, Canadohta Lake, Guys Mills, Saegertown, Conneautville, Hydetown, Blooming Valley, Townville, Spartansburg, Venango and Woodcock. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for northwestern Pennsylvania. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
